title: all the sewerage outlets shall be connected to the sewerage system
clause_text: all the sewerage outlets shall be connected to the sewerage system. Where no such systems exist, a septic tank shall be provided within the plot conforming to the requirements of Regulation No.9.25.
section: Other requirements of bath room and water closet

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
